Disclaimer

Information Accuracy

While we strive to ensure all information on Fursa KE is accurate and up-to-date:

  • All opportunities are posted as provided by the respective organizations
  • Details may change after posting without our knowledge
  • Users should verify information directly with the opportunity providers
  • We cannot guarantee the availability of positions after they are posted

Safety & Security Warnings

Never Pay for Opportunities

  • Legitimate employers will never ask you to pay for a job
  • Be wary of requests for payment during application processes
  • Do not send money via M-Pesa or other payment methods to secure a position
  • Report any payment requests to us immediately

Protect Your Personal Information

  • Never share bank account details during initial applications
  • Be cautious with personal identification documents
  • Use official email addresses and websites only
  • Verify company legitimacy independently

Common Scam Warning Signs

Requests for payment during application

Job offers without interviews

Requests for bank account details

Unprofessional communication

Report Suspicious Activity

If you encounter suspicious activity or potential scams, please report immediately:

WhatsApp: Message us on WhatsApp
